title: ISic000374. I.Sicily inscription 000374
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus) ((·)) s(acrum)
[---]atiae ((·)) Dori-
[di] ((·)) v(ixit) ((·)) a(nnis) ((·)) XX ((·)) Nice-
[phor] pater ((·)) filiae
5[pii]ssimae

Apparatus criticus

CIL

translation

Sacred to the gods of the underworld. Nicephor, the father, (set this up for) his most dutiful daughter, [...]atia Doris. She lived for twenty years.

commentary

Mommsen supplied the father's name as Nice[por], but the form Nice[phor] appears more common.

bibliography

  • Gualtherus 1624 [1625] no.60 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931
  • 10.7092 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
